citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 1:35 pm on
22-Jan-20.
The inspector was informed by a family member that the licensee was away from the facility and would not be
available until evening. No other authorized person was available for inspection. A flyer was left with the family
member with inspector's contact information.

narrative:
